title: So Riot is totally full of shit
body:
I've only played two games today. First game- smooth and quiet, easy. Second game? NOT good, had a trolling garen and a toxic viktor mid. End game we tell eachother to fuck off- i leave lobby and got instantly banned. After getting 3 chat restrictions i never deserved in the place, that i requested four times for proof, was denied my chat logs proof and my requests ignored. No one ever reviewed my account, for anything at all. Never reviewed for toxicity, because if it was i Know I wouldn't be banned right now without a doubt. The timing was as soon as viktor's report went in- i got banned for 14 days.

I'm done with this game. I never deserved the first 3 chat restrictions i got, sent in multiple support tickets about it, had it ignored, and got banned because people report me because THEY'RE pissy.

Riot SAID that they review ban cases- so i was never worried i would get banned because if they at least reviewed cases when people were supposed to get banned, then i would be fine, and i could live with false chat restrictions since no one would help me. But apparently, they don't review shit and let their customers rot. I'm never coming back to play this game. I've wasted way too much time supporting a company that doesn't care about me, or anyone else who plays their game. There isn't one company I can think of that would freely ban someone's account without ever reviewing anything. I'm done.

I'm utterly DISGUSTED at the complete lack of care for their customers. That they have this system in place, and it really pisses me off to be honest, i was already really upset about the false chat restrictions. It disgusts me they still don't have the tribunal up and running, I seriously have a deep, disgusting hatred of riot after all of this, and I seriously won't ever be coming back and will never encourage anyone else to play this poor excuse for a gaming company's game.
